text:
DMK cadre protesting against the attack on G. Balan in Thanjavur on Monday. — Photo: R.M. Rajarathinam

Farmer G. Balan of Thanjavur district, who was assaulted by police personnel and collection agents of a private bank recently for defaulting on loan repayment, got back his tractor on Monday Page 7
title: After protests, farmer gets back tractor
